DOC.brief_summary: This study aimed to investigate in a cohort with chronic kidney disease the longitudinal relationship between aortic stiffness and renal function and mortality.
DOC.brief_title: Aortic Stiffness in Chronic Kidney Disease Stage 2 to 4
DOC.criteria: Age 18 or older CKD 24 pregnancy history of malignant disease with a prognostic life expectancy less than 24 months missing of written and informed consent
